questions.question: What is the staff used for?

choices.answer: indicating the order the notes should be played in
demonstrates how high or low a note should be
it demonstrates the duration of each note
a graph of how many different instruments there are

questions.question: Which of the following are notes?

choices.answer: A
X
B
C#

questions.question: What is the pattern of keys on the keyboard?

choices.answer: groups of 2 and 3 black keys
Groups of 10 and 11 white keys
Groups of 3 and 4 black keys
all of the keys are the same color

questions.question: What is the function of a sharp?  (#)

choices.answer: lowers the note by a giant leap
lowers the note a half step
raises the note by a giant leap
raises the note by a half step

questions.question: What is the function of a flat (b)

choices.answer: raises the note by a giant leap
lowers the note by a half step
lowers the note by a giant leap
raises the note by a half step

questions.question: If a note is higher, it will...

choices.answer: appear higher on the staff
be to the right on the keyboard
appear lower on the staff
be to the left on the keyboard
two notes that share a letter name (ex. C#, Cb)
two notes that sound the same but have different names (ex. C#/Db)
harmonies like major and minor
consonant or dissonant harmonies
